Interface EndpointDescriptor

A structure representing the standard USB endpoint descriptor

Hierarchy

  • EndpointDescriptor

Index

Properties

bDescriptorType

bDescriptorType: number
  • Defined in tsc/usb/descriptors.ts:121

Descriptor type.

bEndpointAddress

bEndpointAddress: number
  • Defined in tsc/usb/descriptors.ts:124

The address of the endpoint described by this descriptor.

bInterval

bInterval: number
  • Defined in tsc/usb/descriptors.ts:133

Interval for polling endpoint for data transfers.

bLength

bLength: number
  • Defined in tsc/usb/descriptors.ts:118

Size of this descriptor (in bytes)

bRefresh

bRefresh: number
  • Defined in tsc/usb/descriptors.ts:136

For audio devices only: the rate at which synchronization feedback is provided.

bSynchAddress

bSynchAddress: number
  • Defined in tsc/usb/descriptors.ts:139

For audio devices only: the address if the synch endpoint.

bmAttributes

bmAttributes: number
  • Defined in tsc/usb/descriptors.ts:127

Attributes which apply to the endpoint when it is configured using the bConfigurationValue.

extra

extra: Buffer
  • Defined in tsc/usb/descriptors.ts:146

Extra descriptors.

If libusb encounters unknown endpoint descriptors, it will store them here, should you wish to parse them.

wMaxPacketSize

wMaxPacketSize: number
  • Defined in tsc/usb/descriptors.ts:130

Maximum packet size this endpoint is capable of sending/receiving.
